TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1116
TEI.2.document_title: Benjamin Carrico to W B Allen, 06-03-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Benjamin Carrico to W. B. Allen, June 3, 3825. Power of attorney to act in case of schooner Mary.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1116

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Benjamin Carrico to W. B. Allen, June 3, 3825. Power of attorney to act in case of schooner Mary.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-03-1825">June 3—1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Capt Allin*/person_mentioned* I have this day Recd a few lines from *person_mentioned*Colo austin */person_mentioned*stating that the Sale is stopt and requesting me to Come over or state the case in writing or appear by agent my health is bad i am a[t] *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*doctor hunter*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* and have been here a week i wish that you could forward a few line to me concerning your property and the business, and what you have lost at the *location_mentioned*Brasses*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Benjamin Carrico*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*if the vessel is to be sold pray that she will be sold for the produce of the country according to law and the tobacco next*/p*
*p*I do appoint you *person_mentioned*W B Allin*/person_mentioned* as my *person_mentioned*agent */person_mentioned*to transact any bussiness of this Suite between me and the *person_mentioned*passenger[s] of the Scooner mary*/person_mentioned* and this Shall Stand instead of a full Power to all intent and purposes*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-03-1825">June 3rd—1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Benjamin Carrico */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
